description:
https://developer.openstack.org/api-ref/placement/#create-resource-provider

That just says:


Response

No body content is returned on a successful POST.



But there is actually a location header in the response which has the UUID of the resource provider in case you didn't provide a UUID when creating it, which would be useful for using the UUID later in other operations with that resource provider.
title: POST /resource_providers api-ref doesn't mention a Location header in the response
